bibl.title: The Financing of Maritime Commerce in the Roman Empire, I-II AD
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. The scale, cost and financing of shipping. - 3. The financing of maritime commerce. - 4. Concluding remarks. - Bibliography. - Uses the papyrological evidence. See in part. p. 226, tabl. 1: Summary of information in P. Bingen 77.

bibl.title: Credito e moneta nel mondo romano – Atti degli incontri capresi di storia dell´economia antica. Capri, 12-14 ottobre 2000.

bibl.seg: RATHBONE Dominic, The Financing of Maritime Commerce in the Roman Empire, I-II AD.

Elio LO CASCIO (a cura di), Credito e moneta nel mondo romano. Atti degli Incontri capresi di storia dell'economia antica (Capri, 12-14 ottobre 2000) = Pragmateiai. 8 (Bari, 2003) pp. 197-229, 1 tabl.

1. Introduction. - 2. The scale, cost and financing of shipping. - 3. The financing of maritime commerce. - 4. Concluding remarks. - Bibliography. - Uses the papyrological evidence. See in part. p. 226, tabl. 1: Summary of information in P. Bingen 77.
